title: The Next Unicorns: Adena Hefets CEO of Divvy Homes, forging a new path to home ownership | E1246
description: To kick off this season of "The Next Unicorns," Adena Hefets, CEO of Divvy Homes, joins to discuss how they are helping Americans blaze a path to owning a home (2:51), if we are in a real estate bubble (25:37), the American home shortage (34:53) and more!

itunes:author: Jason Calacanis
